thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: All in all excellent
thread.title_full: All in all excellent - Review of Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: kaparobi
title: All in all excellent
text:
From the moment we walked in and asked to check in early to the moment we walked out, after collecting our stores luggage, we experienced staff helpfulness and friendliness. They went out of their way to try and get the two required rooms as close together as possible. The restaurant staff were incredibly friendly and helpful... both evening and morning time.
Food was spot on for what you paid. Drinks were well priced for the area.
Rooms were large and comfy.
My only downside is the purple light pollution at night into my room (107). Not major but annoying.
Would definitely stay there again...
